Package danogl.gui.rendering

Class RectangleRenderable

java.lang.Object
danogl.gui.rendering.RectangleRenderable
All Implemented Interfaces:
Renderable
public class RectangleRenderable
extends java.lang.Object
A rectangle Renderable. Note that only the color is supplied in the constructor; the dimensions and position are supplied as usual in every call to Renderable.render(java.awt.Graphics2D, danogl.util.Vector2, danogl.util.Vector2, double, boolean, boolean, double).
Author:
Dan Nirel

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    RectangleRenderable​(java.awt.Color color)
    Create a RectangleRenderable in a given color.

  • Constructor Details

    • RectangleRenderable

      public RectangleRenderable​(java.awt.Color color)
      Create a RectangleRenderable in a given color. The exact shape will be determined by the GameObject with this Renderable.

  • Method Details

    • callGraphicsMethod

      protected void callGraphicsMethod​(java.awt.Graphics2D g, Vector2 topLeftCorner, Vector2 dimensions)

    • render

      public void render​(java.awt.Graphics2D g, Vector2 topLeftCorner, Vector2 dimensions, double degreesCounterClockwise, boolean isFlippedHorizontally, boolean isFlippedVertically, double opaqueness)
      Description copied from interface: Renderable
      Renders the object. Should be called at the render phase.
      Specified by:
      render in interface Renderable
      Parameters:
      g - The graphics object.
      topLeftCorner - Top-left corner of where to render the renderable.
      dimensions - Dimensions of the renderable (in pixels).
      degreesCounterClockwise - Angle of the image. The image is rotated around its center.
      isFlippedHorizontally - True to mirror the renderable (left-right).
      isFlippedVertically - True to mirror the renderable (up-down).
      opaqueness - 1 for opaque, 0 for invisible, values in between for degrees of transparency.
